coreAttributes.name: 'Special Access Pass'
coreAttributes.description: Complete with a sturdy fabric lanyard, and signed by Wesley Wormwood himself, this pass grants the bearer access to the requisitions area of Dominion's Enforcer HQ.

effectTooltipLines.line: Grants access to requisitions area of Dominion's Enforcer HQ

coreAttributes.applyEffects: Signed by Wesley Wormwood, and attached to a sturdy fabric lanyard, this 'Special Access Pass' grants the bearer access to the requisitions area of Dominion's Enforcer HQ.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] a closer look at the pass...
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(show)] off [npc.her] pass to [npc2.name], who is duly impressed by [npc.her] possession of it...
